alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 4:21PM CDT until September 24 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Southern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Southwest Little Rock, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Lonoke... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... England... Wrightsville... Argenta... Keo... Otter Creek... Ironton... Estes... Meto... Toltec Mounds State Park... Protho Junction... Geyer Springs... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
